name: Dr. Jill's Silicone Premier Spreader
description: A premium silicone spreader designed to gently realign and separate toes for improved comfort and reduced friction.
longDescription: Dr. Jill's Silicone Premier Spreader is engineered with high-quality, medical-grade silicone to help realign and separate your toes, easing pressure and minimizing discomfort during daily activities or while wearing dance shoes. Its ergonomic design ensures a comfortable fit that promotes natural toe alignment, which can be especially beneficial for individuals experiencing bunions or overlapping toes. Easy to clean and durable, this spreader is an effective solution for maintaining foot health and reducing friction-induced calluses.

features.title: High-Quality Silicone
features.description: Crafted from durable, medical-grade silicone for long-lasting performance.
